code: import Helper from"./Helper";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function HelperShop(_ref){var incrementEps=_ref.incrementEps,getTotalWatts=_ref.getTotalWatts,updateTotalWatts=_ref.updateTotalWatts,epsMult=_ref.epsMult,shopData=_ref.shopData,updateShopData=_ref.updateShopData;function renderHelper(title,_ref2){var cost=_ref2.cost,eps=_ref2.eps,description=_ref2.description;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Helper,{title:title,eps:eps*epsMult,cost:cost,description:description,upgradesClick:function upgradesClick(title,cost,eps){return purchaseHelper(title,cost,eps,description);}},title);}function createHelperShop(shopData){var helperContainer=[];for(var key in shopData){if(shopData[key].eps)helperContainer.push(renderHelper(key,shopData[key]));}return helperContainer;}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Shop"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"upgrade-buttons-container",children:createHelperShop(shopData)})]});function purchaseHelper(title,cost,eps,description){console.log(eps);if(getTotalWatts()<cost)return false;updateShopData(title,{cost:(cost*2.2).toFixed(0),numActive:shopData[title].numActive+1,eps:eps,description:description});updateTotalWatts(cost*-1);incrementEps(eps);return true;}}export default HelperShop;
